Articles.Content:
Hey CBBP -- I was just adding MechJeb to your control modules in the updated Soviet pack and I noticed that none of the part .cfgs are set up using the PART { } formatting. I believe that any part in the GameData folder has to have that in order to be loaded out of that folder. So if you get a bunch of "my parts aren't loading" complaints, I think that's the problem.

yes thank you I will am uploading the proper working version as we speak.

on another note anyone have the old angara pack? Please up load it and send me it like the ones that used .mus and such.

I have the 1.0.0.0 version of both the Kosmos angara pack and the Kosmos LK back when I downloaded them in 17/10/2012, would that suffice?

on another note anyone have the old angara pack? Please up load it and send me it like the ones that used .mus and such.

I have Angara 3.0. It a bunch of msh files. Is this the right one? I downloaded it on 9/17/2012

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0ByTeMG8Iijz8bmU1ZXgya3pQVkE/edit?usp=sharing

Edited June 2, 2013 by brians200

nah I need the one where it had the stuff with .mu and such.

also I believe I got all those parts loading. lemme know if anything is missing.

Edited June 2, 2013 by CardBoardBoxProcessor

nah I need the one where it had the stuff with .mu and such.

also I believe I got all those parts loading. lemme know if anything is missing.

The one I have has the engines on .mu format it seems, uploading now.

http://www.4shared.com/zip/3LDQyvZF/kosmos_angara-1000.html

Hopefully this is what you're looking for cBBp!
that 4xhared place wants me to make an account to download that. i don't really want to do that :/
There is still a working download for the Angara pack in the depths of the forums, I downloaded it last week and got some of the fuel tanks 0,20 compatible

Yes, search on your latest started threads, or by normak, one of these should feature the pre-wipe Kosmos spacecraft design bureau thread, on it there is a link to download the Kosmos Angara and the LK, thats how I downloaded it, trying to update it with obj_gimbal...hasnt worked out...and I want that RD-0146E badly...BAAAAAAADLLYYYYYY...

EDIT:gonna upload the one I downloaded on dropbox then...

EDIT2:uploading Angara Pack A...hope you want it...

EDIT3:some 40%

EDIT4:some 70%

EDIT5:hope this is what you need, oh god if you would update the Angara pack, oh god oh god oh god Im too excited to write....

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yjztwpcei93thg1/Angara%20Pack%20A.zip

Edited June 2, 2013 by dimovski

anyone have any picutre of the kosmos flags being used?
Are there any albums of all included parts?
YAY! This has been updated! Now I can finally go on to build a space station with the unneccesarily large balka panels!
Can't tell you how happy I am to have this pack back. I've been beside myself without the octagonal trusses, and solar arrays. Thanks for your effort and a great add-on!
it seems the Angara nuclear engine has been removed from the set...

anyone have any picutre of the kosmos flags being used?

I'd be happy to get one on the mun for you

KOSMOS TEAM! I have a humble request.

I've been working with a few other rocketeers to make a functional solar sail mod, and naturally your modules were the best men for the job. I've used two RCS tanks, a structural module, and three solar panels, then reworked the .cfg files for the new behaviors. As far as I can tell the pack works great and is ready for the spaceport, but I want to ask your permission before actually uploading it. If the usage of these parts in their current states is unacceptable, I will gladly remove and replace them with alternates for you.

Here's the mod
Album for those that want it instead: http://imgur.com/a/SOCrp
Hey cBBp, will you ever think about fixing your dragon capsule for 0.20 ? I thought you werent playing ksp anymore but seeing you updated this pack, maybe you could fix the other one ...
a number of the ol' Kosmos SSP pack's parts are like this, what's the fix?
that's the collider showing.
is there anything that can be done??
I am having annoying problems with APAS-69.. Sometimes it wont dock (magnet doesn't work), and now, it wont undock!
